articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: ‘The Fat One’ sings: Spain’s Christmas lottery rolls out millions in prizes - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Known as ‘El Gordo’, the world’s richest lottery is set to pay out close to $3bn in prizes.
articles.content: People across Spain tuned in to watch the televised draw of the Christmas lottery known as El Gordo (The Fat One), as pupils from Madrids San Ildefonso school began singing out the prize-winning numb… [+2237 chars]

articles.author: Jacob Gronholt-Pedersen
articles.title: Norwegian cruise ship loses navigation ability in North Sea during storm - Reuters UK
articles.description: The Norwegian cruise ship MS Maud suffered a power outage after a rogue wave shattered windows on the bridge while it sailed in the North Sea, causing the vessel to lose its ability to navigate, Danish authorities and the ship's owner said on Thursday.
articles.content: COPENHAGEN, Dec 21 (Reuters) - The Norwegian cruise ship MS Maud suffered a power outage after a rogue wave shattered windows on the bridge while it sailed in the North Sea, causing the vessel to los… [+3068 chars]
